title: Welcome back Cotter
body: Hi everybody! If you're reading this, the new server is up* and running**. Can I get a woot woot***! * As opposed to the old one, which is still very DOWN. ** Is your server running? Yes. Then you better go catch it! Okay. *** Please leave your woot woots in the comments. This action, if carried out, will provide me with three bits of information: 1) the comment section and database are still very much intimate with each other, 2) give me an accurate gauge of how many people are accessing the blog and how many aren't, and 3) assure me that the blog didn't lose its entire readership over the weekend.
author: Dan

comments.author: justin
comments.body: I'm still here!

comments.author: Aaron Scott
comments.body: It's like a train...a soul train.

comments.author: Kirsten
comments.body: I'm an addict, glad to have my daily fix back up and running!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Glad to see you guys! I have a feeling a lot of people still can't access the site. They'll just have to wait until their caches reset.

comments.author: steph v.
comments.body: Does this change my website? I've noticed some problems...

comments.author: Matt L
comments.body: w00tzers!

comments.author: Allison
comments.body: word.

comments.author: Pat
comments.body: your dreams were your ticket out, welcome back.

comments.author: Alex
comments.body: w00t!

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body: w00t.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: yo

comments.author: Tawny
comments.body:
woot woot
I'm also an addict, gotta get my Moxie fix!

comments.author: matt
comments.body: woot woot.  i am still in atlanta, and have no plans of loading myself into a u-haul for new jersey any time soon.

comments.author: aj
comments.body: We are up and running.  Thank God!  I had nothing to do this weekend.  Everytime Adam got near the computer I would ask, "Can we get on yet?"  So... yea... woo-hoo

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
I am a golden god!
and...and I'm on drugs!!!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Looks like things are starting to look up... until I make my next post, that is.

comments.author: Sam Spade
comments.body:
WOOT!

I'm in Jersey, but I have nothing to do with that fender bender, I swear...

comments.author: Luke
comments.body: Wooty woot!

comments.author: Ben Dillon
comments.body: I'm addicted to this blog like a fat kid on an M&M.

comments.author: Liz
comments.body:
w00t w00t!

And I must say, the blog looks spiffy from my recently-downloaded Firefox browser!  (You may pat yourself on the back for your influence on my conversion.)

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body: it's alive...it's...a...live!

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Wootx2

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Wee ha! Just about everyone's back!

comments.author: Ole
comments.body: says Ola. I picked a good time for a 9 day road trip I guess.  Welcome back all around.

comments.author: Mena
comments.body: woot woooooooooot!

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body: w00t

comments.author: Brandon
comments.body: I'm here, if you're still looking.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I'm always looking!

comments.author: Mark
comments.body:
Present and correct!

M

comments.author: Grey Hodge
comments.body: I was standing along a road, admiring the sunset, when a man on a galloping horse flashed by yelling "Woot woot!" Indeed, sir. Woot woot indeed.
